Reviews.Title: So far so good!!
Reviews.Author: ROBERT H.
Reviews.Content: So far the hardest part was low crawling up in the attic to run my wiring.  Set up was easy.  as soon as I supplied power the unit came to life.  I am impressed by the image quality at night with the night vision. I have them set by flood lights for additional lighting.  So far I am very pleased with this system.  Now to hook up the mobile app. I will update as I finish.

ProductInfo.Features:
8 Outdoor/Indoor IR Color CMOS Cameras
8-Channel H.264 Network DVR
60-Feet BNC Extension Cable and Mounting Screws x 8
DC12V Power Adapter and 8 Camera Splitter
Remote Control and USB Mouse
ProductInfo.Name: eN-Secure CCTV-8CH8CAM-KIT 8-Channel Security Surveillance DVR with 8 Indoor/Outdoor Cameras and Pre-installed 1TB Hard drive (Black)
